author: felicity
msg: bug 2657: default body-based rule descriptions wouldn't specify between body, rawbody, full, and uri as expected.  I merged got_body_pattern_hit and got_uri_pattern_hit into a single got_pattern_hit, which accepts a description prefix.  now using BODY, RAW, FULL, and URI as appropriate.

author: felicity
msg: bug 2836: scan_directories() would require that there be no whitespace in filenames, but spaces are valid in file names, so fix the RE to ignore what we don't want (starts with . or ,) and allow anything else.

author: felicity
msg: fix description to fit within standard convention

author: nickchalko
msg: ant doesn't like extra ----- in comments
